summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4080 for the improvement of Spokane Street (north side) from Beacon Avenue to 24th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49081, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
